channel.title: Help again!
channel.description:
i need help with something.
1. how to add custom items i got customs but every custom is a weapon like owner pl8 is a pl8 but it is a weapon in the player equipments. how to make the helm to be a helm and pl8 pl8.
2. still customs. how to add like a custom whip or gs hit 99 or higher on one hit?
3. how to get commands on my server. like ::pnpc ::pickup
4. can someone (if possible) make a command like i type ::npc50 and a kbd get where i am?
5. how to add ownerplace adminplace and modplace like im owner can type ::ownertele and get to a owner place?
6. (last one) how to add banks where i want to put them?
if u can answer please do it. or e-mail me at kneistol@online.no
thx

item.description:

hey i got teamwiever and i added you but you arent online so.

and one question about the ::npc thing when i add it it gets error.

can u show a pic of where to paste it somone

Read full topic

item.title: Help again!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:5, topic:300231”]hey pro coder thx again for ur help but i dont got item4.java can i just make it or can u send it to me on moparscape here?
and one more question where to add the ::npc 50 kbd in[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 05, 2009, 09:11:46 am[/size][hr]ok i know where to add but when i have added and i compile it says 2 errors how to add it and where in the folder?[/quote]

It’s harder to explain than to show…
Item4.java, you say you don’t have. :x…
Request me on teamviewer, seriously. I’ll help you out 100% from there.
If you don’t have Teamviewer, download it at http://www.teamviewer.com - full version. Takes about 4 minutes to get, and it becomes worthwhile in the end.
I’m not sure how I can explain it better than what I posted above. :s

Read full topic

item.title: Help again!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:1, topic:300231”]i need help with something.

  1. how to add custom items i got customs but every custom is a weapon like owner pl8 is a pl8 but it is a weapon in the player equipments.
    how to make the helm to be a helm and pl8 pl8.

  2. still customs. how to add like a custom whip or gs hit 99 or higher on one hit?

  3. how to get commands on my server. like ::pnpc ::pickup

  4. can someone (if possible) make a command like i type ::npc50 and a kbd get where i am?

  5. how to add ownerplace adminplace and modplace like im owner can type ::ownertele and get to a owner place?

  6. (last one) how to add banks where i want to put them?

if u can answer please do it. or e-mail me at kneistol@online.no

thx[/quote]

  1. Go into item4.java. There should be a list of items, under public int itemtype
    Whatever the item is (say, Owner Platebody) you place under the correct spot.
    Like… (There should be way more than these, this is just an example)

public static int body[] = { 11169, 430, 11977, 14651, 13994, 13997, 4091, 11154, 11158, 11162, 10408, 11134, 14507, 14512, 6139, 6129, 6615, 6916, 7390, 7592, 5032, 5034, 5030, 1135, 2499, 2501, 2503, OWNERPLATEBODY Item ID GOES HERE};
That’s for BODY. Now, since it’s a platebody, add it under Public Static Int Body, and Public Static Int Platebody. If you want the helm, just add it under Helms; if it’s a full helm, add it under Full Helms, AND helms.

  1. Increase their Strength Bonuses, in Item.cfg. Or, you can make it hit 99 with a special attack. I can’t show you how to do the str bonuses, but I’ll show you how to do the specs.
    Go into client.java, and search if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] ==
    Then, you should see a big list of item IDs and whatever under it. That’s your special attack list.
    You MAY have to do the search again after, incase there’s two sets to add.
    Add THIS under the } on its own line after any other special set:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == WEAPONIDGOESHERE && specialAmount <= 99) {//weapon name specialDamage = 95; specialDamage2 = 105; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == WEAPONIDGOESHERE && specialAmount >= 100) {//weapon name startAnimation(1658); specialDamage = 99 + misc.random(5); specialAmount -= 100; }
That makes your weapon’s special damage hit 94-104. Note: you may have to add more than just that for it to work.
Also, startAnimation(####); is what gfx plays when you use the special. That’s currently set for the whip special attack.

  1. PNPC: }else if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { npcId = newNPC; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("No such P-NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #"); } } Add that with any other commands.
    Pickup: else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That item doesn't exist!"); } } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("You used the command wrong; use 5 digits. ::item 00995 1"); }
    Again, add that under any other command.

  2. Here’s the code for ::npc commands (E.G. type ::npc 50 and kbd appears next to you):

} /*else if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0); sendMessage("You spawn an npc"); } else { sendMessage("No such NPC."); } AGAIN… Add it under any other commands.

  1. To make teleport commands for owners, or whatever… Add this under any other commands:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerzone")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Epic Ancient } else { if(playerRights >= 3) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("You Teleport to the Ownerzone."); } }

Change the teleporttoX = ####'s #### to the X coordinates you want, and same with Y’s.
If you want to make an Adminzone, just change if(playerrights >= 3 to if(playerrights >= 2, and the message, and the coordinates. Same with Modzone, playerrights = 1.
NOTE: if(playerrights >=1 simply means that anyone who is a Moderator, and UP can go there.
Remove the > in >=1 to make it for ONLY moderators, and nobody else. Likewise with others. >=3 for Owners should always have the > incase you have 4 + 5 rights set (hidden mod/admin)

  1. In client.java, search MakeGlobalObject This can be confusing, but:
    Under any of them, add this:
              makeGlobalObject(Xcoord, Ycoord, 2213, -2, 10);

Let me explain this.
Xcoord and Ycoord are the coordinates you want the bank booth to appear on.
2213 is the Bank Booth Object ID.
-2 is which way the bank booth will be facing. Normally it faces south; that is north.
10 isn’t something you should mess with. Just leave it as is.

I hope that helped you. If you have any questions, request me on teamviewer. I’m on usually, all day. Info is in my sig.

Read full topic
